channel.title: apple tart on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in apple tart on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Joy of baking
item.description: With the cold weather and shorter day lights lots of baking is going on and enjoying the butter and sugar lately. Feeling guilty as cann’t resist and moreover did not do any exercise after my Paris - Versailles marathon :( We were invited to one of my colleague’s place for the first time after almost 3 years in France for ‘Galette des rois’. It was very memorable and an enjoyable evening.
